data.title: Tavares Sledge - Men's Basketball
data.meta_description:
Tavares Sledge (44) Forward  - 2013-14:Â  Back up AJ Pacher at center...first career three at Valpo...started at Milwaukee with 12 points and seven rebounds.

2012-13:
data.text:
2013-14: Back up AJ Pacher at center...first career three at Valpo...started at Milwaukee with 12 points and seven rebounds.

2012-13: Played in 34 games while starting 23, mostly early in the season...second in rebounding with 140 rebounds...tied for second in blocks...high of 13 points vs Green Bay...three times grabbed nine rebounds.

2011-12: During trip to Italy, he scored 11 points in the third game and performed well on the boards...eight rebounds at Ohio State...16 points/eight rebounds vs Kenyon...seven rebounds at Air Force...first of two starts vs Idaho.

Notes: From Brookwood (AL) High School near Tuscaloosa...averaged 14 points and 11 rebounds as a junior...Brookwood went 19-6 under head coach Thad Fitzpatrick...as a senior, averaged 15.3 points, 12 rebounds and two blocks as team went 25-4--a new school record for wins...born March 24, 1992...son of Karla Sledge.

CAREER HIGHS

Points: 16 vs Kenyon (11/13/11)

Field Goals Made: 6 vs Kenyon (11/13/11)

Field Goals Attempted: 12 vs Green Bay (1/3/13)

3-Pt. Field Goals Made: 1 at Valparaiso (1/10/14)

3-Pt. Field Goals Attempted: 1 on 10 occasions

Free Throws Made: 4 vs Kenyon (11/13/11)

Free Throws Attempted: 8 vs Green Bay (1/3/13)

Rebounds: 11 at Ohio (3/22/14)

Assists: 2 on five occasions

Blocks: 2 on three occasions
